AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01SpeedIncrease01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast taps into its latent power, increasing Attack Speed by [GetAttackSpeedBuff]% and Movement Speed by [GetMoveSpeedBuff]%.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEPA01SpeedIncrease01
BuffBlueprint.Description: Attack Speed and Movement Speed increased.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01Acclimation
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast becomes more resistant to heavy blows. When an enemy deals [GetDamage] or more damage to Unclean Beast, it takes [GetReductionPercent]% less damage for [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01VenomSpit01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Spews a corrosive venom at its target, dealing [GetInitialDamage] damage and an additional [GetDebuffDamage] damage over [GetDebuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01VenomSpit02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Spews a corrosive venom at its target, dealing [GetInitialDamage] damage and an additional [GetDebuffDamage] damage over [GetDebuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01VenomSpit03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Spews a corrosive venom at its target, dealing [GetInitialDamage] damage and an additional [GetDebuffDamage] damage over [GetDebuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01VenomSpit04
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Spews a corrosive venom at its target, dealing [GetInitialDamage] damage and an additional [GetDebuffDamage] damage over [GetDebuffDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01PutridFlow
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Venom Spit lands, it leaves a toxic pool around the victim, dealing [GetDamage] over [GetDuration] seconds.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01OozeOn
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Oozes virulent bodily fluids. Enemies in range take damage per second and their Attack Speed is slowed.\n\nUnclean Beast loses Health while Ooze is active.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01OozeOff
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Stop oozing bodily fluids.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01Ooze01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast oozes virulent bodily fluids. While active, nearby enemies take [GetDebuffDamage] damage per second and their Attack Speed is slowed by [GetDebuffSlow]%.\n\nUnclean Beast loses [GetDebuffSelfDamage] Health per second.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEPA01Ooze01
BuffBlueprint.Description: Taking poison damage. Attack Speed reduced.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEPA01BestialWrath01
BuffBlueprint.Description: Weapon Damage increased.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01BestialWrath05
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast enters a frenzy for [GetDuration] seconds.\n\nWeapon Damage increased by [GetDamageBuff]%. His movement speed cannot be reduced in this state.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEPA01BestialWrath05
BuffBlueprint.Description: Weapon Damage increased. Unaffected by slows.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01DiseasedClaws01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast's claws reduce the target's Movement Speed by [GetSplashMultBuff]%.\n\nLasts [GetDuration] seconds.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEPA01DiseasedClawsSelf01
BuffBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast's claws reduce the target's Movement Speed.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01DiseasedClaws02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast's claws reduce the target's Movement Speed by [GetSplashMultBuff]%.\n\nLasts [GetDuration] seconds.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEPA01DiseasedClawsSelf02
BuffBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast's claws reduce the target's Movement Speed.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01DiseasedClaws03
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast's claws reduce the target's Movement Speed by [GetSplashMultBuff]%.\n\nLasts [GetDuration] seconds.

BuffBlueprint.Name: HEPA01DiseasedClawsSelf03
BuffBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast's claws reduce the target's Movement Speed.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01PostMortem01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Unclean Beast attacks, enemies are afflicted with a disease. When they die, they will explode, dealing 150 damage and sending smaller units into the air.

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01Plague01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Unclean Beast deals damage, it has a chance to start a plague, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage over [GetDuration] seconds and spreading to nearby units.\n\nAnything that survives the plague becomes immune to it for [GetImmuneDuration] seconds.
AbilityBlueprint.GetDamageAmt: function(self) return math.floor( Buffs[self.Name].Affects.Health.Add * Buffs[self.Name].DurationPulse * -1 ) end

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01Plague02
AbilityBlueprint.Description: When Unclean Beast deals damage, it has a chance to start a plague, dealing [GetDamageAmt] damage over [GetDuration] seconds and spreading to nearby units.\n\nAnything that survives the plague becomes immune to it for [GetImmuneDuration] seconds.
AbilityBlueprint.GetDamageAmt: function(self) return math.floor( Buffs[self.Name].Affects.Health.Add * Buffs[self.Name].DurationPulse * -1 ) end

AbilityBlueprint.Name: HEPA01FoulGrasp01
AbilityBlueprint.Description: Unclean Beast clutches a target in its claws, stunning them and draining [GetDamageAmt] life over [GetDuration] seconds.
AbilityBlueprint.GetDamageAmt: function(self) return math.floor( self.Pulses * self.Amount ) end
